reviews.review_msg: This will be my first & last class with her. She was pretty rude maybe that is the french "way" but I could not stand it. She called students out with little regard for their feelings. Not to say we should be babied but there are nicer ways to talk to people. I am doing well in the class but DO NOT like her. WARNING. be careful with her

My FAVE French Dept. prof @ SFU. He's extremely passionate about the subject and very concerned about his students in & outside of class. He'll act out certain things in lecture and occasionally speak in English to be very clear. Speaks French well but with a super Anglophone accent. Be ready to answer questions though because he might pick on you!
